member.name: T:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from classes, enum values, properties and others.

member.name: M:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter.ConstructorDescription(System.Type,System.Type[])
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from a constructor.
member.param: Type to get the description from
Types of the desired constructor to get the description from
member.returns: The DescriptionAttribute text from the given constructor or null if none was found

member.name: M:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter.Description(System.Enum)
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from an enum value.
member.param: Enum value to get the description from
member.returns: The DescriptionAttribute text from the given enum value or null if none was found

member.name: M:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter.Description(System.Type)
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from a type.
member.param: Type to get the description from
member.returns: The DescriptionAttribute text from the given type or null if none was found

member.name: M:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter.EventDescription(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from the given event property.
member.param: Type of the event property to get the description from
Name of the event property to get the description from
member.returns: The DescriptionAttribute text from the given event property or null if none was found

member.name: M:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter.FieldDescription(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from the given field.
member.param: Type of the field to get the description from
Name of the field to get the description from
member.returns: The DescriptionAttribute text from the given field property or null if none was found

member.name: M:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter.MethodDescription(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from the given method.
member.param: Type of the method to get the description from
Name of the method to get the description from
member.returns: The DescriptionAttribute text from the given method property or null if none was found

member.name: M:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter.ParameterDescription(System.Type,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from the given method parameter.
member.param: Type of the method to get the parameter description from
Name of the method to get the parameter description from
Name of the parameter of the method to get the description from
member.returns: The DescriptionAttribute text from the given method parameter or null is none was found

member.name: M:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter.PropertyDescription(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from the given property.
member.param: Type of the property to get the description from
Name of the property to get the description from
member.returns: The DescriptionAttribute text from the given type or null if none was found

member.name: M:DescriptionLibrary.DescriptionGetter.ReturnDescription(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Get the DescriptionAttribute text from the given method return.
member.param: Type of the method to get the return description from
Name of the method to get the return description from
member.returns: The DescriptionAttribute text from the given method return or null if none was found
